price: Aranızdan sözü gizlədən də, onu açıq deyən də, gecə gizlənən də, gündüz gəzib dolanan da (Allah üçün) eynidir.
arabic: سَوَآءٞ مِّنكُم مَّنۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡفِۭ بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَارِبُۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sawāon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasāribun bil-nahāri
